transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
Reduces damage taken by the caster from enemies inflicted with Eternal Bleeding
+50% damage dealt by Eternal Bleeding
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.4_1_jp:
ATK DEF HP +16%
【絶えざる出血】がある対象から
受けるダメージDOWN
【絶えざる出血】のダメージ+50%
チェーンパッシブのWGダメージ+1
transcend.4_1_kr:
ATK DEF HP +16%
영원한 출혈 보유 대상에게 자신이 받는 피해 감소
영원한 출혈의 피해 +50%
체인 패시브의 WG 감소량 +1
transcend.4_1_zh:
ATK DEF HP +16%
降低来自附带永恒出血目标的伤害
永恒出血伤害+50%
连锁被动效果WG降低量+1
transcend.5_1:
ATK DEF HP +22%
Burst Level 3 Unlocked
+25 Action Points at battle start
+4% Ally Team Accuracy
transcend.5_1_jp:
ATK DEF HP +22%
バーストスキル3段階解禁
戦闘開始時、AP+25
味方の命中+4%
transcend.5_1_kr:
ATK DEF HP +22%
버스트 3단계 해금
입장 시 AP +25
아군 명중 +4%
transcend.5_1_zh:
ATK DEF HP +22%
解锁3阶爆发
入场时AP+25
友军命中+4%
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
Always granted Retribution's Dominion
At the start of battle, inflicts Eternal Bleeding on all enemies for 2 turn(s). (Ignores Immunity and Resilience)
transcend.6_jp:
ATK DEF HP +30%
【懲罰の領域】常時付与
戦闘開始時、敵全体に
【絶えざる出血】+2ターン付与
(免疫と効果抵抗無視)
transcend.6_kr:
ATK DEF HP +30%
징벌의 영역 상시 보유
전투 시작 시 적 전체에게 영원한 출혈 +2턴 부여 (면역 및 효과 저항 무시)
transcend.6_zh:
ATK DEF HP +30%
始终附带惩戒领域
战斗开始时,对全体敌人造成永恒出血+2回合
(无视免疫和效果抵抗)

SKT_FIRST.name: Suffocating Hatred
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, and has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Eternal Bleeding</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\nAfter attacking, if only one target survives, inflicts the same effect on the enemy again.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、対象に<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>【絶えざる出血】</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。\n攻撃後、戦場に敵が単体の場合、敵に追加で<color=#28d9ed>【絶えざる出血】</color>1個を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>영원한 출혈</color>을 부여합니다.\n공격 후 생존한 대상이 한 명이라면 적에게 동일 효과를 한번 더 사용합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>的几率对目标造成<color=#28d9ed>永恒出血</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。\n攻击后,若只有1名目标存活,则再次对敌人造成一次相同效果。

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Grants Retribution's Dominion for 2 turns\nIf already granted Retribution's Dominion, detonates Eternal Bleeding
SKT_BURST_2.effect_jp: 【懲罰の領域】+2ターン\n獲得済の場合\n【絶えざる出血】破裂
SKT_BURST_2.effect_kr: 징벌의 영역 +2턴\n이미 보유 중이라면 영원한 출혈 폭발
SKT_BURST_2.effect_zh: 惩戒领域+2回合\n如已附带效果,则引爆永恒出血

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changes to Enhanced Skill\nTargets all enemies\nReduces cooldowns of all allies by 1 turn
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 強化スキルに変更\n攻撃範囲拡大\n味方全体のスキルターン-1ターン
SKT_BURST_3.effect_kr: 강화 스킬로 교체\n공격 범위 확대\n아군 전체 쿨타임 -1턴
SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh: 转化为强化技能\n扩大攻击范围\n全体友军冷却时间-1回合

SKT_SECOND.name: Painful Rack
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks all enemies. After attacking, inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Eternal Bleeding</color> on all enemies and grants <color=#28d9ed>Stealth</color> to all allies except for the caster for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\nAfter attacking, if only one target survives, inflicts the same effect on the enemy again.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与える。攻撃後、敵全体に<color=#28d9ed>【絶えざる出血】</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与し、自分を除く味方全体に<color=#28d9ed>隠れ身</color>を付与する。\n攻撃後、戦場に敵が単体の場合、敵に追加で<color=#28d9ed>【絶えざる出血】</color>1個を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격합니다. 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 적 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>영원한 출혈</color>을 부여하고, 자신을 제외한 아군 전체에게는 <color=#28d9ed>은신</color>을 부여합니다.\n공격 후 생존한 대상이 한 명이라면 적에게 동일 효과를 한번 더 사용합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh: 攻击全体敌人。攻击后,对全体敌人造成<color=#28d9ed>永恒出血</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>,并使除自身以外的全体友军获得<color=#28d9ed>隐身</color>效果。\n攻击后,若只有1名目标存活,则再次对敌人造成一次相同效果。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Pure Blood's Punishment
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies, and gains <color=#28d9ed>Retribution's Dominion</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. (Irremovable)\nIf already granted <color=#28d9ed>Retribution's Dominion</color>, <color=#28d9ed>detonates</color> all <color=#28d9ed>Eternal Bleeding</color> effects on the target, and increases damage dealt by detonation by <color=#28d9ed>50%</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与え、自分に<color=#28d9ed>【懲罰の領域】</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。(解除不可)\nすでに<color=#28d9ed>【懲罰の領域】</color>がある場合、対象に付与されている<color=#28d9ed>【絶えざる出血】</color>をすべて<color=#28d9ed>破裂</color>させ、破裂のダメージが<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>UPする。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격하고, <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>징벌의 영역</color>을 획득합니다. (해제 불가)\n이미 <color=#28d9ed>징벌의 영역</color>을 보유 중이었다면 대상이 보유한 <color=#28d9ed>영원한 출혈</color>을 모두 <color=#28d9ed>폭발</color>시키며, 폭발에 의한 피해는  <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 증가합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 攻击全体敌人,并获得<color=#28d9ed>惩戒领域</color>,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。(无法解除)\n若已附带<color=#28d9ed>惩戒领域</color>效果,则<color=#28d9ed>引爆</color>目标附带的全部<color=#28d9ed>永恒出血</color>效果,引爆造成的伤害提升<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Eternal Bleeding</color> on the enemy with the highest Attack for <color=#28d9ed>3 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Eternal Bleeding</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で攻撃力が最も高い敵単体に<color=#28d9ed>【絶えざる出血】</color>を<color=#28d9ed>3ターン</color>の間付与する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、対象に<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>【絶えざる出血】</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>3턴</color> 동안 가장 공격력이 높은 적에게 <color=#28d9ed>영원한 출혈</color>을 부여합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> 확률로 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>영원한 출혈</color>을 부여합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携技能自由顺序效果</color>:攻击后有<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>的几率对攻击力最高的敌人造成<color=#28d9ed>永恒出血</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>3回合</color>。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>的几率对目标造成<color=#28d9ed>永恒出血</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
